participant_1.background:
I remember the feeling of freedom when I ran through the woods behind my house as a child.
I stretch to get my blood flowing.
i am a recovering alcoholic.
i still call my ex boyfriend on his birthday because birthdays are special.
i am excellent at playing pool.

participant_2.background:
I'm looking for a place with more space for my stamp collection and my three dogs.
I was a florist before I became a wedding planner.
my parents are not married anymore.
my parents live in kentucky.
i am a very funny woman.

content.text: Hey! How are you doing today?
I'm doing great, thank you for asking! I'm just relaxing at home today. What about you?
I'm doing pretty good too. I'm just getting ready for work. I'm a wedding planner, so I'm always busy!
Oh wow, that sounds like a lot of fun! I'm sure you get to see a lot of beautiful weddings.
It is a lot of fun, but it can also be a lot of work. But it's always worth it when I see the happy couples on their wedding day.
I'm sure it is! So, what are your hobbies?
I love to read, play games, and go for walks in the park. I also have three dogs, so I spend a lot of time with them.
I love to read too! What are some of your favorite books?
I love a lot of different kinds of books, but I especially love historical fiction and romance novels.
I love historical fiction too! I just finished reading a book about the Civil War.
Oh, that sounds interesting! I've always been interested in the Civil War, but I've never read a book about it.
It was a really good book. It was really interesting to learn about the different perspectives of the war.
I'll have to check it out!
You should! It's called "The Killer Angels" by Michael Shaara.
Thanks for the recommendation! I'll definitely check it out.
